sub_title: Commercial Director at Deep BV, Hydrography & Geophysics
summary:
I am a highly motivated individual who seeks out new adventures to grow business and provide stakeholders with return on investment. I have a strong interest in technology and use my experience and drive to grow these into successful and profitable businesses that are unique within their marketplace.

During my career so far I have had the opportunity to work with companies in different phases of growth; building a successful service portfolio from scratch in East Africa to leading a team of 300 highly technical staff resulting in commercial and operational excellence which translated to increased profitability, diversification in innovation and improved client relationships.

Each opportunity has been unique and has allowed me to develop my skills and experience in leadership. I have a strong cultural understanding and use that to best optimize people management, organizational development and P&L ownership and accountability. I love to connect people through communication and understanding. I’m technology savvy, willing to travel, creative and have a strong entrepreneurial & business acumen to transform ideas into reality.
